nodes.text: Cala was an airless rock planet with no moons that occupied the third closest orbital position to the star Asar. It was located within the Ilum system, a part of the Unknown Regions' 7G sector.
Cala was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the Ilum system, and therefore Cala, in grid square G-7.
